summary: When a campus radio DJ, and indie-rock band manager, discovers the lead singer of his band, has quit - he thinks he has troubles. But when a sexy young girl named Tommy, comes to audition as the new lead singer - his real troubles begin.
cast: Tom Belding|Royce Boswell|Michael Bourland|Stephen Bradford|Michael Brouillet|Isaac Cass|Josh Cass|Kathy Rose Center|David Dettmer|Jeffrey Frost|Trevor Lee Georgeson|Anne Griffin|Drew Johnson|Austin Lincoln|Kevin Joseph Martin|Kumar Pallana|Stephanie Parker|Susan Roberts|Robyn Russell|Michael Shell|Morgan Sorne|Theresa Twa|Lauren Walsh
director: Director: Aaron James (as Aaron James Sorensen)
title: Campus Radio
